# 精通 Java 11（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jingtong-java-11-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jingtong-java-11-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jingtong-java-11-chuyi
jingtong-java-11-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jingtong-java-yiyi-chuyi
jingtong-java-yiyi-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
